item.title: Foobar
My First Post
item.description: Trying to create this poker game was really difficult but I did eventually create a simple 2 player, high card wins poker game where instead of using nested for loops I decided to use a single for loop then split my list then used indexing in order to calculate the sum of the hands and created an IF statement to decided the winner
